thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.ca
thread.title: Ashley Brianna

author: Ashley Brianna
title: Ashley Brianna
text:
I have wanted custom USBs for my photography business for a while now but I was having a hard time finding a company that was located in Canada and had exactly what I was looking for. Flashbay was everything I was looking for !
I couldn't believe all of the choices of what kind of USB you could get when I first saw their website. I ordered 25 twister USBs with my logo and they look so amazing ! The quality of them is fabulous!! My logo is gold and black and it turned out exactly how I wanted.
The rep Sabrina was fantastic to work with the whole time. She was very quick to get back to me and very thorough when answering my million questions.
I will be recommending Flashbay to everyone and be coming back for more in the future!
